author: Anthony King
title: Coronavirus: The drug options come into sharp focus
description: Right now, remdesivir is the most promising one in tackling the virus head-on
content:
A cacophony of drug hopefuls for Covid-19 has bombarded news headlines and bounced around social media for weeks. There have been incendiary announcements about game changers bamboozling experts and non-experts.
It is not all noise though. There are drugs, n… [+7451 chars]
